metadata.name: SPARKLE COLLECTION "SNOWFLAKE" Futuristic Wedding Cheongsam By SPARKLE COLLECTION
metadata.description:
SPARKLE COLLECTION founded by cheongsam designer Karen Chan is an East-meets-West cultural artistic brand. Karen is famous for collaborating with renowned artists & Intangible Cultural Inheritors to produce cheongsams & Tang jackets with HK elements. Every piece in SPARKLE is an artwork, limited by quantity & with a story of its own to tell.

This digital video art is a playful funky virtual runway rendition of the【SNOWFLAKE】Modern Wedding Cheongsam “Qun-Gua” - a collaboration between Karen & interior designer Natalia Khaw. Inspired by the unique and intricate snowflake, this cheongsam has all the trimmings of a traditional Chinese qun-gua, yet edgy & chic.

To celebrate SPARKLE’s launch of their Digital Art Collection, buyer will receive a physical silk cheongsam (avail. in S/M/L), so you own both a virtual contemporary art collectible & a form of wearable art.

Pick-up@SPARKLE COLLECTION CONCEPT SHOP or by courier (all charges borne by buyer) +852 63118921/sparklecollection.co
